title: Andy Reid, Aaron Rodgers, bad teams, Joe Burrow, and NFL picks
itunes:title: Andy Reid, Aaron Rodgers, bad teams, Joe Burrow, and NFL picks
description:
Colin talks about why Andy Reid is in a must win situation this weekend, why he feels Packers QB Aaron Rodgers should take more risks, the bad teams in the NFL, why Joe Burrow could have a tough time in the NFL, and his playoff picks. Guests include Rich Ohrnberger, Peter King, Logan Ryan, Darius Slayton, and Rob Parker.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
